https://tmrev.io/movie/630269-Apocalyptic 2077 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/td8mHC6gSFICYw4WLku03juDNhk.jpg After witnessing the apocalypse from a research bunker in the Scottish highlands, Jack survives with only the station's AI mainframe computer ( J.I.M. ) to keep him company. When the food supplies run out 8 years later, Jack & JIM set out across the post apocalyptic wastelands to deliver an important message. Mayhem ensues as they encounter Ice Pirates, Cannibals , Cyber-Punks and Zombie Nuns. Apocalyptic 2077
